ReportSpec.Name: Food Bank Transaction Totals Report
ReportSpec.Description: Displays totals for food bank item transactions
ReportSpec.Author: Technical Training

DataRetrieval.CreateSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_REPORT_FOODBANKTRANSACTIONTOTALS (@TRANSACTIONTYPE nvarchar(10))
as
select c.[KEYNAME] as [FOODBANK], f.[DESCRIPTION], fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPE] as [TRANSACTIONTYPE], fi.[NAME] as [FOODITEM], sum(ft.[FOODITEMAMOUNT]) as [TOTALFOODITEMAMOUNT], sum(ft.[QUANTITY]) as [TOTALFOODITEMQUANTITY] from dbo.[USR_FOODBANK] f left join dbo.[CONSTITUENT] c on c.[ID] = f.[CONSTITUENTID] inner join dbo.[USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER] fh on fh.[FOODBANKID] = f.[ID] left join dbo.[USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL] ft on ft.[FOODBANKTXHEADERID] = fh.[ID] left join dbo.[USR_FOODITEM] fi on fi.[ID] = ft.[FOODITEMID] where fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPE] = @TRANSACTIONTYPE or @TRANSACTIONTYPE is null group by c.[KEYNAME], f.[DESCRIPTION], fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPE], fi.[NAME]
